title: Historic Savannah hotel acquired by Atlanta group to become Hotel Indigo
text: Historic Savannah hotel acquired by Atlanta group to become Hotel Indigo Jul 13, 2015, 7:08am EDT Array The lobby of the Hotel Indigo in Midtown Atlanta. A historic downtown Savannah hotel purchased by Atlanta-based Noble Investment Group in 2014 is being renovated and will operate under the boutique hotel brand Hotel Indigo. The hotel, at 201 West Bay Street, is set to open in March 2016, reports Savannah Morning News. The Indigo brand is managed by InterContinental Hotel Group , which has its Americas headquarters in Atlanta. The first Hotel Indigo opened in 2004 across from The Fox Theatre . There are five locations in Georgia. Related Content
